move on.'' Mr Cameron said his aide had done an excellent job- and pointed out that Mr Andy Coulson had resigned from the News of the World over the phone hacking claims. He said: I feel he has been punished twice for the same offence. ''I choose to judge him by the work he has done for me, for the Government and the country. Mr Andy Coulson , 43, left the News of the World in January 2007 after its then-Royal editor Clive Goodman and private investigator Glenn Mulcaire were jailed for hacking into mobile voicemails. a foster home. And Best Friends isn't simply looking for any pet lover for the Michael Vick dogs. ''We feel like dogs going into these homes are being ambassadors'' for the breed, Garcia said. Print Andy Coulson quits Downing Street communications role The prime minister's communications chief Andy Coulson has resigned, blaming coverage of the News of the World phone hacking scandal. Mr Andy Coulson said coverage had made it difficult for me to give the 110% needed in this role. He faced pressure after stories about phone hacking while he was editor. While protesters dismissed the Cabinet reshuffle as cosmetic and demanded Hosni Mubarak 's immediate ouster, Zahi Hawass said Egyptians should give his boss more time. The people in the streets have to give this government an opportunity to change, he said cheerfully. had no legal claim to it. The SCA, which Zahi Hawass heads, said in an email that its request had been approved by both Prime Minister Nazif and the Egyptian ministry of culture. This request is a natural consequence of Egypt's long-standing policy of seeking the restitution of all archaeological and historical artefacts that have been taken illicitly out of the country, it said. Zahi Hawass has campaigned to repatriate several pharaonic treasures in recent years, including the Rosetta Stone now in the British Museum. Copyright 2011 The Associated Press. All rights reserved. But it contains few surprises and, after so many years of divisive debate, is unlikely to change many minds, writes Howard Kurtz . ''What is known is that he has in these 50 chapters marshaled his best defense; only history's final verdict remains unknown.'' Donald Rumsfeld , that master of the tart zinger,... Photo
